message: I'll give you $200,000, a fair split for a first offer.
You're being greedy, I'll give you a small share, but you'll have to do better next time!
I'm not giving up on getting a better deal. I'll make a new offer in the next round.
I'll meet you in the middle this time, but I'm not giving up on a better deal.
You're getting closer, but I'm not giving up on the majority
I'm not giving up yet, I'll try to get a better deal in the next round.
I'm getting closer to the middle, but I think I can do better than that.
You're really close, but I'm not budging, this is my final offer
Alright, I'll take $400,000. It's not ideal, but it's better than going to zero.
